src:
Mensesneg: Dewan Pengawas KPK Akan Banyak Diisi Ahli Hukum
04 Nov 2019, 13:44 by Andhika Prasetia
Jakarta - Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) akan memilih langsung anggota Dewan Pengawas (Dewas) KPK untuk pertama kalinya. Mensesneg Pratikno menyebut posisi ini akan banyak diisi figur berlatar belakang hukum.
"Macam-macam. Tentu saja ahli hukum yang akan banyak ya, tapi juga ada non-hukum, ada dimensi sosialnya muncul. Tapi belum diputuskan final. Sekarang masih listing lah," ujar Pratikno di gedung Krida Bhakti, Jl Veteran III, Jakarta Pusat, Senin (4/11/2019).
Aturan soal penunjukan anggota Dewas KPK tertuang dalam UU Nomor 19/2019 tentang KPK. Pratikno mengatakan nama-nama yang masuk daftar calon anggota Dewas KPK masih belum final.
"Sementara ini pak presiden setiap saat ketemu, selalu meminta masukan kira-kira siapa. Intinya kan mengawal kerja pimpinan KPK yang baru," ujar Pratikno.
text:
Minister of State Secretariat: KPK's Supervisory Board Will Be Many Legal Experts
Nov 04 2019, 13:44 by Andhika Prasetia
Jakarta - President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) will elect the KPK Board of Trustees (Dewas) for the first time. State Secretary Pratikno said that this position would be filled with many figures with legal backgrounds.
"Various things. Of course there will be a lot of legal experts, but there are also non-laws, there are social dimensions appearing. But the final decision has not yet been decided. Now it's still listing," Pratikno said in the Krida Bhakti building, Jl Veteran III, Central Jakarta , Monday (11/04/2019).
The rules regarding the appointment of Dewas KPK members are contained in Law Number 19/2019 regarding the KPK. Pratikno said the names on the Dewas KPK candidate list were not final.
"In the meantime, the president meets all the time, always asking for input about who he is. The point is to oversee the work of the new KPK leadership," Pratikno said.
